title: Deepening Learning Strategies in Social Studies through Infographic Creation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Social Science Theory and Data Analysis Experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on Offline Collaborative Activities Using Digital Devices (Tablets/Laptops)

learning_goals: Learners can represent social phenomenon analysis results through visual storytelling techniques (color, icons, layout)
Learners enhance their ability to structure information and extract core messages during the infographic creation process
Learners improve the clarity and effectiveness of communication in their infographics by over 20% based on peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
